allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript errors for production build

- Remove unused state variables (setPlacements, currentPlacement, setUploadedFile)
- Fix neckArtwork position type error by using setState callback

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Remove unused placements variable references

- Remove Placement import
- Remove unused price calculation useEffect
- Remove placements from customization object (was empty array)
- No functional changes to site behavior

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Remove remaining unused imports and state variables

- Remove unused priceAPI import
- Remove unused setPriceQuote and setLoadingPrice state
- No functional changes, build optimization only

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix TypeScript error in backend index.ts

- Prefix unused req parameter with underscore
- No functional changes

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix Railway reverse proxy issue

- Add trust proxy setting for Railway
- Fixes rate limiting and IP detection
- Resolves checkout errors

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git commit -m "Fix trust proxy to use 1 hop for Railway")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Improve error logging for production debugging

- Always include stack traces in production logs
- Add error name to log output
- Helps diagnose checkout failures on Railway

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add detailed debug logging to order creation

- Log each step of order creation process
- Log full error details including stack trace
- Helps identify exact failure point in checkout

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Test JSON serialization in order response

- Add explicit stringify test before sending response
- Add more detailed logging for response sending
- Helps identify if order object has serialization issues

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix getOrder to handle order numbers correctly

- Check if ID is UUID format before querying by UUID
- Prevents PostgreSQL error when fetching order by order number
- Fixes checkout redirect to order confirmation page

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git commit -m "Fix number formatting in OrderTracking page")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add Apple Pay and Google Pay support

- Create PaymentRequestButton component using Stripe Payment Request API
- Integrate with checkout flow to support digital wallet payments
- Show Apple Pay/Google Pay button when available on user''s device
- Falls back to regular card input for unsupported browsers
- Maintains same order creation and payment flow

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
